name: TC-1-P :: add a product to shopping cart

actions.expectedResult: The page loads successfully and displays a list of products.

actions.action: Click on the 'Sauce Labs Backpack' item image link to view details.
actions.expectedResult: The page navigates to the detailed view of the 'Sauce Labs Backpack' with URL 'https://www.saucedemo.com/v1/inventory-item.html?id=4'.

actions.action: Click the 'ADD TO CART' button for the item.
actions.expectedResult: The shopping cart badge should become visible and display '1'. The 'ADD TO CART' button should change to 'REMOVE' and have class 'btn_secondary btn_inventory'.

actions.action: Verify the item count in the shopping cart.
actions.expectedResult: The shopping cart icon should show '1' item. The 'REMOVE' button for the item should be visible and correctly styled.
